snippet: Recent seizures of banned cargo show that Pyongyang has used increasingly deceptive techniques, the panel’s report to the Security Council says.
abstract: Inspections and seizures of banned cargo show that North Korea is using increasingly deceptive techniques to circumvent international sanctions; illegal arms trade has allowed North Korea to continue nuclear and ballistic missile programs that sanctions were intended to curb.
lead_paragraph: Recent seizures of banned cargo show that Pyongyang has used increasingly deceptive techniques, the panel’s report to the Security Council says.

headline.main: North Korea Ably Evades Its Sanctions, Panel Says
headline.print_headline: North Korea Ably Evades Its Sanctions, Panel Says
